page.title: 12Mining Visits.
page.content: The first visit we went on was to{ {Tolgus Tin,}even though it was out of our twelve square area. Their end product is tin concentrate. At the moment they have four Cornish stamps, and they were loud, at one time they had 170 working at the same time. The Cornish stamps crushed the rock. The second visit was{Wheal Jane.}They used shaking tables the same as{Tolgus {Tin}does. The mine has 16 levels, and 400 people working at the mine. The mine is 1500 feet deep. Then a man took us to the laboratories, on the shelves in the laboratories were different chemicals, and rocks. Our next visit was to{Camborne School} of mines, first we went in and looked at the rocks, and there was a great variety of them.
